course_title: Clinical Directed Study: NRSG 537MN Mental Health Prac
class_notes: Students cannot self-register. Registration will be processed by the Office of Education.
course_description: This directed clinical focuses on the diagnosis and management of complex health problems for specified populations from an advanced nursing practice perspective. Diagnostic reasoning and clinical application are emphasized. Student and faculty determined focus.
sections: Class Nbr: 6174, Section #: 9, Type: SUP, Campus: ATL, Meets: Does Not Meet, Instructor: D. Drobbin, Status: Open
